I'd highly recommend "Get Shorty" if you're in the mood for a business movie with a unique twist! This film follows a mobster who ventures into Hollywood to collect a debt and discovers that the movie business is much like his current line of work, featuring an all-star cast including Danny DeVito, Rene Russo, and Barry Sonnenfeld.

Alternatively, "The Secret of My Success" offers a comedic take on climbing the corporate ladder, starring Michael J. Fox as a fast-rising Arthur Tate who navigates his way to fame and fortune with the help of three women and his ambitious mother. Enjoy!

If you're looking for something more lighthearted yet still engaging, "The Trouble with Harry" could be a fun choice! This quirky comedy revolves around the mysterious death of a man named Harry and the comical attempts to deal with his body by several townsfolk. Starring the likes of Jerry Mathers and Alfred Hitchcock, it's sure to put a smile on your face.
